p: But it would be great to see even a cursory comparison of the selected ensemble model (FSNetwork-TTW) and the four other ensemble models (FSNetwork-EW, FSNetwork-CW, FSNetwork-TW, FSNetwork-TRW) for 2017/18, even though those other models weren't officially entered into the competition. In particular, it would be really interesting to see whether the performance similarities between these models in the training phase were also evident in such an unusual influenza season, or if the differences between these models conveyed any (dis)advantages in this scenario.
